import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import { Pagination, Autoplay, Navigation } from 'swiper'; import 'swiper/css'; import './../Cards/cards.sass'; const Hills = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
Jouri Hills
{t('download')} PDF
5 {t('photo')}
); }; export default Hills;
